name: Dynasty Warriors 5: Xtreme Legends
description:
Dynasty Warriors 5: Xtreme Legends is an action game developed by Omega Force. It was originally released in 2006. Koei published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Dynasty Warriors 5: Xtreme Legends on PlayStation 2.
Takashi Morinaka directed the game.
